0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>LET'S <break time='200ms'/> BE <break time='200ms'/> CONSIDERATE <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Activity <break time='200ms'/> 3.1 <break time='200ms'/> Act <break time='200ms'/> out <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: Rusiru, his mother and an old lady are at the bus stop. Rusiru: Mother, the bus is here. Let's get in.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rusiru'>Rusiru</phoneme>, <break time='200ms'/> his <break time='200ms'/> mother <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> an <break time='200ms'/> old <break time='200ms'/> lady <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> at <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> bus <break time='200ms'/> stop. <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rusiru'>Rusiru</phoneme>: <break time='200ms'/> Mother, <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> bus <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> here. <break time='200ms'/> Let's <break time='200ms'/> get <break time='200ms'/> in. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: Mother, the bus is here. Let's get in.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Mother, <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> bus <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> here. <break time='200ms'/> Let's <break time='200ms'/> get <break time='200ms'/> in. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.text: Rusiru, can't you see, there's an old lady behind you. Let her get on to the bus first.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='rusiru'>Rusiru</phoneme>, <break time='200ms'/> can't <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> see, <break time='200ms'/> there's <break time='200ms'/> an <break time='200ms'/> old <break time='200ms'/> lady <break time='200ms'/> behind <break time='200ms'/> you. <break time='200ms'/> Let <break time='200ms'/> her <break time='200ms'/> get <break time='200ms'/> on <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> bus <break time='200ms'/> first. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

6.text: I'm sorry, I didn't see you.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>I'm <break time='200ms'/> sorry, <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> didn't <break time='200ms'/> see <break time='200ms'/> you. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.text: Hurry up, hurry up. Get in quickly. It's getting late.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Hurry <break time='200ms'/> up, <break time='200ms'/> hurry <break time='200ms'/> up. <break time='200ms'/> Get <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> quickly. <break time='200ms'/> It's <break time='200ms'/> getting <break time='200ms'/> late. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

9.text: Please wait, I have another big bag that I need to take with me.
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Please <break time='200ms'/> wait, <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> have <break time='200ms'/> another <break time='200ms'/> big <break time='200ms'/> bag <break time='200ms'/> that <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> need <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> take <break time='200ms'/> with <break time='200ms'/> me. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

10.text: Can I help you with the bag?
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Can <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> help <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> with <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> bag? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

11.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Yes, <break time='200ms'/> thank <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> very <break time='200ms'/> much. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
